name: Aventurine
note: Often associated with calm and balance; many people choose it for a sense of optimism.

name: Quartz
note: Clear and rose varieties are widely chosen by people who appreciate clarity or gentleness.

name: Amethyst
note: Traditionally linked with serenity and reflection.

name: Turquoise
note: Frequently connected with travel and protection in various traditions.

name: Citrine
note: Commonly selected for a bright, uplifting feel.

name: Apatite
note: Sometimes chosen for focus and fresh momentum.
